login_information_error: Oops! We are unable to retrieve the login details.
cpcivm_login_information_instance_info_l:
In a terminal, enter the following command:
ssh {{user}}@{{ip}}
cpcivm_login_information_instance_info_w: When you first log in, you will need to use the VNC console to finalise the Windows configuration. Then use your preferred RDP client, for example via a Linux desktop:
cpcivm_login_information_application_rea: Your account doesn't have the necessary rights to access the application login details. Please contact your administrator to get access.
